sqlMap.update: update T_Finance_Driver set id=#id# ,settle_number=#settle_number# ,stowage_id=#stowage_id# ,deduct_money=#deduct_money# ,settle_money=#settle_money# ,real_money=#real_money# ,settle_mode=#settle_mode# ,settle_type=#settle_type# ,driver_memo=#driver_memo# ,branch_id=#branch_id# ,input_date=#input_date# ,operator_man=#operator_man# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Finance_Driver WHERE id IN(#ids#)
